Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another
"Artificial Life Forms" or "Super Bosses" Category ally
on the team upon the character's entry*
- {passiveImg:once}ATK & DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}, guards all attacks and
launches an additional attack that has a high chance of
becoming a Super Attack for 3 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +5
- ATK & DEF 300%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of
becoming a Super Attack
*For every attack performed*
- {passiveImg:forever}Ki +1 (up to +5)
- {passiveImg:forever}ATK 20%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 100%)
*For every attack received*
- {passiveImg:forever}Ki +1 (up to +5)
- {passiveImg:forever}DEF 20%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 100%)
*When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Artificial Life Forms",
"Super Bosses" or "Movie Bosses" Category characters*
- DEF 250%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there are no "Super Heroes" Category allies attacking
in the same turn*
- ATK 250%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of performing a critical hit 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*After the enemy launches a Super Attack at the character*
- Launches an additional Super Attack

Leader Skill.Name: Ultimate Weapon That Wreaks Destruction and Doom

5627.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

5628.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage to all enemies 
and greatly lowers ATK & DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Explosive Scream
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Massively raises ATK temporarily and 
causes ultimate damage to enemy; 
DEF +999% and directs enemy's attack 
towards the character for 1 turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when all allies attacking 
in the same turn are "Artificial Life Forms" 
or "Super Bosses" Category characters 
starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle, 
or when all allies attacking in the same turn 
are Extreme Class starting from the 6th turn 
from the start of battle (once only)
